mapper.select: SELECT O.composite_virtual_object_id as id , created_date , description , modified_date , name , aspect_id , function_id FROM os_cvo O, composite_virtual_object C WHERE O.composite_virtual_object_id = C.id AND O.orchestration_service_id = #{value}
SELECT id , name , description , aspect_id , function_id , device_type , created_date , modified_date FROM composite_virtual_object WHERE id = #{value}
